Step 3: Alternative URLs

If the above fails, try these alternative URL formats:

  • Public URL: https://calendar.google.com/calendar/ical/newagefotografen@gmail.com/public/basic.ics
  • Private URL: https://calendar.google.com/calendar/ical/[LONG_PRIVATE_ID]/private-[KEY]/basic.ics
